page.title: 07INTERVIEWS IN S.HEDINGHAM.
page.content: During April and May we visited{Mr. {Newmans butcher's shop and Tanner's {Dairy}to ask questions about their work.{Mr.Newman}showed us the slaughter house,where he slaughters the animals and keeps them until they are ready to cut up and sell. He keeps some animals in the huge freezer in the slaughter house. At{Tanners Dairy}we found it was very big and noisy. It was very messy too!there was water and milk all over the floor. There were great big machines and tanks. They deliver milk to places all over Suffolk and North Essex using a fleet of large lorries. They work seven days a week. We were given a bottle of milk each to drink, we all enjoyed that.
